data.lyric:
[ti:Yours (Wedding Edition)]
[ar:Russell Dickerson]
[al:Yours - EP]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Yours (Wedding Edition) - Russell Dickerson
[00:08.73]Written by：Russell Dickerson
[00:17.46]I was a boat stuck in a bottle
[00:19.91]
[00:20.74]That never got the chance to touch the sea
[00:23.47]
[00:24.55]Just forgot on the shelf
[00:26.57]No wind in the sails
[00:28.05]Going no where with no one but me
[00:31.04]
[00:31.74]I was one in one-hundred billion
[00:34.35]
[00:34.94]A burned out star in a galaxy
[00:37.75]
[00:38.95]Just lost in the sky wondering why
[00:42.33]Everyone else shines out but me
[00:44.94]
[00:45.72]But
[00:47.03]I came to life when I first kissed you
[00:50.58]The best me has his arms around you
[00:54.16]You make me better than I was before
[00:57.86]Thank God I'm yours
[01:02.03]
[01:07.69]I was a worn out set of shoes
[01:10.64]
[01:11.69]Wandering the city street
[01:13.94]
[01:14.93]Another face in the crowd
[01:16.86]Head looking down
[01:18.10]Lost in the sound of a lonely melody
[01:20.86]
[01:22.16]Empty pockets at a roulette
[01:24.46]
[01:25.29]Always landing on a lost bet
[01:29.26]Just live for the spin and hope for the win
[01:32.28]Go all in just to lose again
[01:36.23]But
[01:37.23]I came to life when I first kissed you
[01:40.77]The best me has his arms around you
[01:44.35]You make me better than I was before
[01:48.05]Thank God I'm yours
[01:51.54]The worst me is just a long gone memory
[01:55.06]You put a new heartbeat inside of me
[01:58.65]You make me better than I was before
[02:02.31]Thank God I'm yours
[02:08.54]
[02:19.39]I was a boat stuck in a bottle
[02:21.74]
[02:22.75]That never got the chance to touch the sea
[02:25.62]
[02:27.35]I came to life when I first kissed you
[02:30.87]The best me has his arms around you
[02:34.51]You make me better than I was before
[02:38.11]Thank God I'm yours
[02:41.62]The worst me is just a long gone memory
[02:45.16]You put a new heartbeat inside of me
[02:48.33]
[02:48.83]You make me better than I was before
[02:52.43]Thank God I'm yours
[02:59.12]
[02:59.80]Thank God I'm yours
[03:02.90]
[03:06.81]Thank God I'm yours
[03:15.08]
[03:21.46]Thank God I'm yours
data.trans:
[ti:Yours (Wedding Edition)]
[ar:Russell Dickerson]
[al:Yours - EP]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:08.73]//
[00:17.46]我是困于瓶中的船
[00:19.91]
[00:20.74]从未在大海上扬帆
[00:23.47]
[00:24.55]埋没了价值
[00:26.57]无东风助力
[00:28.05]孤身一人 无处可去
[00:31.04]
[00:31.74]我是大千世界的沧海一粟
[00:34.35]
[00:34.94]我是浩瀚银河的一颗微星
[00:37.75]
[00:38.95]迷失在苍穹里 百思不得其解
[00:42.33]为何众人皆璀璨 而我独黯淡
[00:44.94]
[00:45.72]但是
[00:47.03]当我第一次亲吻你 我仿佛重获新生
[00:50.58]拥有你就是我的人生巅峰
[00:54.16]你让我比以前更加美好
[00:57.86]感谢上帝 我属于你
[01:02.03]
[01:07.69]我是一双破旧的鞋
[01:10.64]
[01:11.69]在城市的大街上游荡
[01:13.94]
[01:14.93]人群中一张脸庞
[01:16.86]低头向下望
[01:18.10]迷失在这孤独的旋律中
[01:20.86]
[01:22.16]在赌场上输得倾家荡产
[01:24.46]
[01:25.29]总是一败涂地
[01:29.26]生活艰难 期盼反败为胜
[01:32.28]获得一切 只是为了失去
[01:36.23]但是
[01:37.23]当我第一次亲吻你 我仿佛重获新生
[01:40.77]拥有你就是我的人生巅峰
[01:44.35]你让我比以前更加美好
[01:48.05]感谢上帝 我属于你
[01:51.54]潦倒的我已消失在记忆里
[01:55.06]你让我的心重焕活力
[01:58.65]你让我比以前更加美好
[02:02.31]感谢上帝 我属于你
[02:08.54]
[02:19.39]我是困于瓶中的船
[02:21.74]
[02:22.75]从未在大海上扬帆
[02:25.62]
[02:27.35]当我第一次亲吻你 我仿佛重获新生
[02:30.87]拥有你就是我的人生巅峰
[02:34.51]你让我比以前更加美好
[02:38.11]感谢上帝 我属于你
[02:41.62]潦倒的我已消失在记忆里
[02:45.16]你让我的心重焕活力
[02:48.33]
[02:48.83]你让我比以前更加美好
[02:52.43]感谢上帝 我属于你
[02:59.12]
[02:59.80]感谢上帝 我属于你
[03:02.90]
[03:06.81]感谢上帝 我属于你
[03:15.08]
[03:21.46]感谢上帝 我属于你
